name: FAudioInputDeviceInfoProperty
doc: Encapsulates audio device properties which are utilized by UI facing classes such as FAudioInputDeviceProperty.

DeviceName: User friendly name of the audio device
DeviceId: The unique id used to identify the device
InputChannels: The number input channels this device supports
PreferredSampleRate: The preferred sample rate for this audio device
bIsDefaultDevice: Boolean indicating if this device is the currently the system selected input device
